de.bzus.graph3d

Class Punkt

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bzus.graph3d.Punkt

  • public class Punkt
extends java.lang.Object
    Punkt provides methods for constructing, managing and displaying 3 dimensional points in 2 dimensions.
    Author:
    Werner Siegfried Genreith
